description: This file defines the 'Board' React component, which renders a 3x3 grid for a tic-tac-toe game, composed of multiple 'Square' components. It manages the layout and passes necessary props to each Square for rendering and interaction handling.

methods.name: Board({ board, onSquareClick, gameOver })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a tic-tac-toe board grid with props for board state, click handling, and game over status.
